definition.title: What Makes a Great Speaking Topic?
definition.content: A great speaking topic combines your unique expertise with your audience's pressing needs. It's specific enough to deliver real value, yet broad enough to explore deeply. The best topics promise transformation—a clear before and after for your audience.

landingContent.formula: Provide solutions that focus on one concept per topic while remaining general enough to expand upon.
tips: Focus on value for listeners - great topics provide actionable solutions, not promotion
One concept per topic - each topic should focus on a single idea, like a blog post
Tailor to the audience - adjust topics to align with each podcast's specific listeners
Lead with transformation - frame topics around the change your audience will experience

faq.question: How many topics can I generate at once?
faq.answer: You can generate 3, 5, or 10 topics at a time. We recommend generating more than you need so you can pick the best ones.

faq.question: Can I get topic descriptions or just titles?
faq.answer: You can choose either format. 'Titles only' gives you quick ideas, while 'Titles with descriptions' provides detailed talking points for each topic.

faq.question: Is the generated content unique?
faq.answer: Yes, each generation is unique based on your specific inputs. However, we recommend personalizing topics to match your voice and expertise.

faq.question: Can I use these topics commercially?
faq.answer: Absolutely! All generated content is yours to use for podcasts, speaking engagements, content marketing, or any other purpose.
